item.description:
Rain rain go away. It looks like good weather for Saturday. Join us for delicious dimsum. After dimsum we burn off some calories with a leisurely walk to the Waterfront (Columbus Park). Enjoy the scenic views and fresh air. If you join us for the walk, we recommend you take the T into Boston so you don't have to worry about parking or meters.

It has been a while since we've had dimsum. We hope you can join us. You can get discounted parking from Shoppers Garage at 40 Beach St. (across from East Ocean Rest). Bring your parking tix with you and get it validated at China Pearl. $6 for 3 hours.
item.how_to_find_us: tables will be reserved under "Steve Wong"

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum and Waterfront Walk
